docs.snippet: Many expected Yemen’s Houthi rebels to become vulnerable after they killed their most important ally. But weeks later, they are locking up their foes.

headline.print_headline: Yemeni Crisis Deepens As Rebels Lock Up Foes
headline.main: Yemen’s War Enters a Dark Stage as Rebels Squeeze the Capital

docs.snippet: RT was early to embrace the video site. Now that relationship is drawing scrutiny as investigators look into Russian interference in the 2016 presidential election.

headline.print_headline: YouTube Gave Russian Outlet Portal Into U.S.
headline.main: Russia’s Favored Outlet Is an Online News Giant. YouTube Helped.

docs.snippet: An upcoming show at the Museum of Fine Arts in Boston explores the idea of family: from the ones shown in portraits to the fleeting glimpses of the photographer whose own family is back home, waiting.

headline.main: In Search of the American Family

docs.abstract: An upcoming show at the Museum of Fine Arts in Boston explores the idea of family: from the ones shown in portraits to the fleeting glimpses of the photographer whose own family is back home, waiting.

docs.snippet: The portable, foldable, self-contained vendor booth is the newest innovation in mobile food service.

headline.print_headline: Thinking and Cooking Inside a Box
headline.main: Somewhere Between a Food Truck and a Food Tent, You’ll Find a Cubert

docs.snippet: In an email, Mr. Loeb, a hedge fund manager, accused Deputy Mayor Richard Buery of trying to score political points “over the interest of little vulnerable black children and their families.”

headline.print_headline: Race Dominates Email Exchanges Over Public Schools
headline.main: Dan Loeb Exchanges Racially Charged Emails with Top de Blasio Official

docs.snippet: Annalisa Marchionna returned to a coastal town she visited as a child to photograph a fisherwoman who lives her life in rhythm with the sea.

docs.snippet: Complaints filed by people whose electronics were searched at the border without warrants highlight a growing debate over privacy, security and technology.

docs.snippet: The police in Australia have arrested a man in the theft of a 1.5-ton Canberra home, which was hauled cross-country before they caught up with it.

headline.main: ‘Tiny Home’: Affordable, Stylish — but a Bit Too Easy to Steal

docs.snippet: In the past year, I have come under fierce attack and my wife has come down with cancer — and I have learned the importance of real friendships.

docs.snippet: In the Democratic Republic of Congo, Thomas de Wouters sought to document a growing youth movement devoted to nonviolence.
